name: Pi Boutique Hostel
address: 61 Thu Khoa Huan Street, Da Lat City, Đà Lạt, Việt Nam
description:
Pi Boutique Hostel có xe đạp miễn phí, trung tâm thể dục, khu vườn và phòng chờ chung ở Đà Lạt. Cách Quảng trường Lâm Viên 18 phút đi bộ và Hồ Xuân Hương 1.7 km, chỗ nghỉ cung cấp sân hiên và quầy bar. Một số phòng tại chỗ nghỉ có ban công với view núi.

Ngoài phòng tắm riêng với vòi sen và đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí, các phòng tại khách sạn cũng có Wi-Fi miễn phí, trong đó một số phòng có view thành phố. Các căn ở Pi Boutique Hostel được trang bị TV màn hình phẳng và máy sấy tóc.

Khách tại chỗ nghỉ có thể thưởng thức bữa sáng thực đơn buffet.

Pi Boutique Hostel cách Công viên Yersin 1.9 km và Sân golf Dalat Palace Golf Club 2.9 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Liên Khương, cách khách sạn 32 km, đồng thời chỗ nghỉ có cung cấp dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay mất phí.

review.comment_positive: Everything is just perfect in this hostel. The staff are a huge added value to the whole experience. They are SO attentive and SO welcoming that you feel like home. The facilities are awesome if you're working remotely and there is no need to go to a cafe as the hostel has beautiful setups and there are power points everywhere. Also, the breakfast is AWESOME. We loved it so much that we decided to extend our stay for a week and we'll come here every time we come back to Da Lat.

review.comment_positive:
The receptionist girl spoke good English and was very helpful in making all the arrangements for bookings to adventure abseiling and also bus ticket to Saigon. She made great 👍👍👍 ☕ coffee. 

The hostel was very clean, tidy and matched exactly like shown in the pics. 

The decor of the hostel is like 5 star boutique hotel with so many wooden carved work of art. 

I highly recommend this hostel/hotel.

review.rating: 공사 뷰와 소음. 골목 깊은 장소 최악
review.comment_negative:
파이 호스텔 바로맞은편에 건물 짓는 공사중 ㅅ
새벽 5시닐밤12시까지 함. 
새로 짓는 건물은 파이호스텔 사장 건물인듯, 그렇게 공사소음이 심한데, 본인 파이 호스텔을 운영 하는게 이해안감. 달랏 시장과의 거리도 꽤 먼 골목 안쪽에 위치함. -빵 조각과 커피,두고조식이라 하기 이해 안감. 파이호스텔 그나마 뷰가 있어 예약 했으나 맞은편 공사 뷰와 소음에 미칠뻔

review.rating: Достойное, необычное место с замечательным видом на Далат
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Очень красивый интерьер. Удобная локация, совсем недалеко от центра. Но при этом не на центральной дороге, так что было относительно тихо.

Замечательно что есть свой паркинг для Байков, который закрывается. 

Классный прозрачный балкон в номере, с прозрачным полом. Можно пощекотать нервы. 

Скромный, но вкусный завтрак 

Есть лифт, что немаловажно учитывая что там шесть этажей.
review.comment_negative:
Комната намного меньше чем кажется по фото. Высокая слышимость, слышно абсолютно все что происходит у соседей на этаже. Так что если вам повезёт соседями то будет замечательно.

И ещё немного странно что в туалете есть окно, из которого можно увидеть соседские номера 😅

review.rating: Super verblijf bij een super hostel!
review.comment_positive: Het personeel was super vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Ze hebben ons geholpen met het regelen van vervoer naar de volgende accommodatie en ze gaven ons tips voor activiteiten in de buurt, zelfs voordat we er überhaupt waren. Daarnaast waren de kamers mooi ingericht en comfortabel. Een ander pluspunt was het ontbijt, dat erg lekker was (gyoza’s, croissantjes, buns, pindakaas).
review.comment_negative: Een minpunt was dat de kamer erg gehorig was en wij daarom de muziek uit de lobby bleven horen. Verder was het licht van de display op de spiegel in de badkamer erg fel. Dit scheen ook door de glazen badkamerdeur de slaapkamer in.

review.comment_negative:
Unfortunately had an allergic reaction to the incense they burn in the property so would not recommend staying here if you struggle with asthma.

The breakfast was ok and was self serve. Felt like the breakfast rush had already happened even though we saw no one else staying at the property.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên đã nhiệt tình tư vấn các địa điểm ăn uống ngon cho cả nhóm.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Die Einrichtung und der Ausblick auf die Stadt sind super toll. Die Matratze war so bequem, dass meine Liebste uns jetzt so eine kaufen möchte :-D Das Personal ist freundlich und sehr darauf bedacht, dass man einen tollen Aufenthalt hat. Das besonders komfortable Shuttle zum Flughafen, welches uns die Rezeption organisiert hat war ein besonders gelungener Abschluss für unseren Aufenthalt.
review.comment_negative:
An einigen winzigen Stellen schlägt das Design die Praktikabilität, aber darüber lässt sich leicht hinwegsehen. Beispielsweise konnte man den Haartrockner nicht in die Steckdose am Spiegel einstecken, ohne mit dem Stecker das Licht auszuschalten und das Handwaschbecken ist nicht sonderlich praktisch. 

Das Frühstück wurde in den Bewertungen oft bemängelt, da wir es aber nicht in Anspruch genommen haben können wir dazu leider nichts sagen.

review.comment_positive: So cute hostel, the staff very helpful.

review.comment_negative: 호스텔은 많은 여행객이 오가는만큼 청결에 민감해야 한다고 생각합니다. 여행 중 베트남의 다른 지역의 호스텔도 비슷한 가격대에 머물렀지만 상당히 큰 차이를 느꼈습니다. 침대시트와 이불은 5일간 단 한번 교체되었고 바디워시,샴푸,수건,드라이기등은 제공되지 않았습니다. (빌려주는지 모르겠지만 안내도 못받음) 침대 프레임 밑으로 많은 먼지와 이물질이 있어 청결에 조금만 더 신경쓴다면 좋을것 같습니다

review.rating: would stay in Pi again any time!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Great place to stay when you are visiting Dalat. The place is very home-alike. Located in a very quiet street, however, the area is one of the best in Dalat surrounded by great cafes, restaurants and small boutique stores. Pi is of great value and offers all additional services you might need ( motorbikes, tours, transportation etc). The staff is really friendly and helpful + they speak English (not to be taken for granted in Vietnam). They also had a nice collection of books guests have left! :)

review.rating: 달랏 최고의 호스텔, 달랏여행을 더욱 값지게 만들어준 숙소
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
달랏에서 가장 좋은 호스텔, 최고의 호스텔을 꼽으라면 이 곳을 꼽겠습니다.
달랏에 수많은 호텔과 게스트하우스들이 있지만 여기가 압도한다고 생각합니다.

-달랏에서 가장 감각적이고 트렌드한 건물 외관과 내부 인테리어
-조용한 골목에 위치한 숙소, 안전하고 편안한 투숙환경을 제공함
-체계적인 숙소 운영. 모든 직원들이 친절하고 따뜻하게 대해줌
-직원들의 늘 발전을 위해 고민하던 모습들이 느껴졌음
-호텔같은 시설과 분위기
-달랏 어디를 여행하기에도 좋은 위치
-한끼로 너무나 훌륭한 조식서비스
-생각보다 좋았던 수압과 온수
-숙소 곳곳이 포토스팟
review.comment_negative:
-메트리스가 고정되어 있지 않아서 다소 잘 움직임
-찬물보다 뜨거운 물이 더 잘 나옴. 다행히 날씨가 서늘한 편이라 괜찮았음

review.rating: Quiet and modern hostel in the city centre
review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
review.comment_positive:
1. Location: Close to the city centre but at the same quiet at night. 10 mins walk to the night market. Close to many restaurants and shops.
2. Friendly staff
3. Very clean.
4. Think blanket is provided as Da Lat is pretty cold at night.
5. Every bed gets its own light, two power points and a long shelf. 
6. Get a nice view from the balcony. 
7. Room is spacious and bed is comfy. 
8. Nice design.
review.comment_negative:
1. No separation of shower and toilet. The toilet all turns wet after shower.
2. The rubbish bin in the WC should be cleaned everyday as the toilet paper cannot be thrown into the toilet bowl. 
3. Security : The use of "key" for the elevator is quite stupid for the dorm room. First of all, all of the dorm rooms are not locked and can be easily accessed by the outsiders by using the stairs. So, actually the dorm rooms are not secured at all. But, at the same time, the hostel add a "security system" for the elevator where the key card for the elevator can only access to the ground floor and the floor you lived in.  This means you need a "key card" whenever you need to go to your dorm room/go down (but at the same time the dorm rooms are actually not secured) which makes it inconvenience to me . So, I suggest either remove the key card system for the elevator, or add the key card security system directly on the room of the dorm room. 
4. The room is very dark at night. 
5. It will be great if the they get egg option for their breakfast.

review.comment_positive: Todo en general, la limpieza, las chicas de recepción ( nos ayudaron a reservar el bus para nha tran) te ofrecen té, genial todo lo respecto al hotel.
review.comment_negative: Desayuno poca variedad.

review.comment_positive: My wife and I had a wonderful stay. The staff were so friendly and helpful. The rooms were modern and very clean. The location was in the middle of everything we wanted to visit so we walked instead of taxis. Construction to the building opposite the hotel, as I had read in previous reviews, has finished and we had a nice peaceful stay. Breakfast was simple but nice and we had enough. There was no air conditioner in the room but the temperature was cool and we didn't even need the fan. I would most definitely stay at the Pi again. And once again thank you staff for your lovely smiles every time we saw you.

review.rating: A gem worth checking out if you are looking to stay near the city centre with an assurance that staff will be there for
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Clean environment with wonderful ambience. Staff speak English and were very helpful with our enquiries and ever courteous (thank you to the girl at the counter, Nhien). She even offered us complimentary cups of artichoke tea when we were waiting for our Grab driver when it was cold. 

Loved the room! I could watch the moon and night sky from the comfort of my bed. Staff were proactive in arranging a fan in the room as per enquired even before we checked into our room. What a pleasant surprise! 

Complimentary tea and dried orange were both delicious and absolutely a joy to enjoy. 

They even have an elevator which was the best thing ever! No climbing of stairs! 

An Cafe (nice views and great for breakfast) and Lien Hoa Bakery (amazing pastry) were within walking distance from the place. Loved having these options available with just a short walk away.

review.rating: Good location but comes at a price
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The staff was super helpful in organizing all matters: Tour (we did the country side tour, but there are 6 others) and airport transportation. The location is just right - around 10min walking  to the night market/lake 20min to the pink church and (in the other direction) the crazy house. For all other locations we recommend taking a taxi.
review.comment_negative:
The room had some minor non-critical issues, each could be addressed easily: There was only one chair and one night desk. The TV was weirdly installed around the corner (not that we watched TV, but if  that's your thing in Dalat... don't go to Dalat), there was no AC (but a fan), the window was not well insulated, so there is noise (day) and coldness (night) coming in. There was no (mini)fridge. (The days in Feb are quite warm in Dalat, the nights are relatively cold). 

The bathroom had no curtain for the shower and also no lowered tiles - thus there is water next to the toilet. Only one (medium size) towel is provided per person.

The breakfast was poor - it does not meet western tastes. There is toast, no fruits (only banana) - and other than that some gyoza dumpling (pork, veggie) and something else to (self-)steam - some rice. And sausages  to (self-)grill. 

In summary the most expensive place during our 16 days trip, but the one with the most little issues

review.rating: Best Hostel & Kindest staff in Dalat
review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
review.comment_positive:
I had a motorbike accident while I was visiting in Dalat, the staff came to the hospital to help me translate, assist me all the time, and made sure I was accompanied. I really appreciate their help and their considerate support, it was truly touching! Also, I was booking for two nights and reserving 2 days for the motorbike, since I need to check out early, I've only charged for one night and one day for the motorbike. Really appreciate everything they've thought about, thank you!
我在大叻旅行的時候不小心騎車摔傷了，Pi Hostel 的前台人員第一時間就來醫院幫我翻譯、一路在我旁邊陪我、確定我的狀態，真的非常感謝她！另外，我本來預訂了兩晚的房間、租兩天機車，由於我需要提前離開，他們只跟我收一晚的住宿費和租機車一天的費用，再次覺得他們非常貼心，謝謝！

PEANUT BUTTER AND BANANA ON TOAST 🥵 and also granola with macadamia nuts💦. I thought the wooden sculptures were a bit much at first but once you ask the owner of his Agarwood collection you’ll find it is actually very interesting and an important part of Vietnamese culture. his passion shows in his collection. and I really enjoyed talking about it to him.

review.comment_positive: The property is exceptionally well-maintained. It has an artistic interior that's full of positivity. The fish pond right outside the hostel is also a great mood lifter. The staff, especially the little girl Ni who made the best cappuccino, was very courteous and co-operative. I had a great time at Pi hostel.
review.comment_negative: Sometimes, the room smelled a bit, but I guess that's just because of the frequent use of the bathroom with little space for ventilation. The rooms didn't have air conditioners, but that's okay because Da Lat is a cold place anyway. Honestly, no complaints at all - I had a great time staying at Pi hostel and I'd definitely want to visit this place whenever I'm back in Da Lat.

Of course it is a hostel, so do not expect the most luxury hotel ever, but it is very cosy, clean and the room has everything you need. The location of the hotel is really nice and they offer really nice scooters for not so much money. Would definitely  recommend!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
Giường Trong Phòng Nghỉ Tập Thể 8 Giường Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ

review.rating: Perfekter Rückzugsort nach Entdeckungstour in Da Lat und Umgebung
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
Die Unterkunft ist sehr modern und schön eingerichtet. Die Zimmer sind sehr sauber und sehr gut ausgestattet. Wir hatten ein „Deluxe Room“ im 5. OG mit Balkon und waren sehr zufrieden. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Bei jeder Frage und Bitte hat man sich sofort um
uns bzw. unsere Anliegen gekümmert. Wenn es möglich wäre, 100 Sterne für das Personal. Wir haben außerdem einen Roller direkt im Hotel gemietet und die Umgebung in Da Lat erkundet. Ein Absolutes Must Have aber mit Früh Aufstehen verbunden ist das Cloud Hunting in Cau Dat. Abends haben wir meistens auf dem Nightmarket gegessen, welcher zu Fuß in 10min erreichbar ist. Da Lat und Umgebung ist wunderschön. Wir empfehlen mindestens 2 volle Tage einzuplanen. Neben den ganzen Wasserfällen können wir auch den Me Linh Coffee Garden empfehlen. Für Food Fans empfehlen wir Nem Nuong (55.000 VND/pro Person). Wir waren bei „Quan Nem Nuong Co Thu“. sehr sympathisches Pärchen und sehr sehr leckeres und frisches Essen.
review.comment_negative:
Für Gehörsensible werden die Zimmer hellhörig sein. Hierfür gibt es ja Oropax ;-)
Die Temperatur des Wassers in der Dusche war leider sehr nervig einzustellen. Meistens war es sehr heiß oder zu kalt. Aber trotzdem kein Grund einen Stern abzuziehen.

review.comment_positive: Nice ambience and very clean, room was nice and the chinese teapot, jasmine tea leaves and dried fruit provided in room was a nice touch, comfortable stay. I liked the provided in-room slippers too. Really nice size for a solo traveler.
review.comment_negative: Would be good if there was a drinking water station/machine provided so that there was no need to purchase bottled of water from the stores nearby.

review.comment_positive:
Accueil

Location scooter
review.comment_negative: Rien

review.rating: I ve stayed here many times. Good location. High quality.
review.comment_positive: Right in the heart of Dalat, but on a quiet street. A rare find ;)
Lễ Tân cực kỳ thân thiện. Mình sẽ quay lại

review.rating: Hip, cool und Jung ! Tolle Lage, zu Fuß in wenigen Minuten in der Innenstadt & Night-Market -  top
review.comment_positive:
Schönes und einfaches Hotel über DaLat. Junges Personal und sehr hilfsbereit. Zimmer sind eher klein (3.Stock) - keine Ahnung, ob andere Etagen größere Zimmer haben. Aber halb so schlimm, da man die meiste Zeit ja unterwegs ist.
Frühstück klein aber fein, und reicht auch für einen Start in den Tag.
Zu Fuß ist man relativ schnell am Night Market oder an Bars und Stadt. Also echt cool !
Die Betten sind aber sehr, sehr hart. Also wenn das für jemanden schlimm ist, dann lieber anderweitig buchen.
review.comment_negative: nur die sehr harten Betten. Sonst war alles super und ich würde wieder kommen.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Khách sạn có sân chơi rộng rãi và an toàn cho trẻ em, gia đình tôi rất thích.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: I absolutely loved my trip here, so many memories made and moments that I with treasure in my heart. The setting is stunning. The breakfast beautiful. The staff are super friendly and smiling too. I am so grateful for them and their help during my stay. Honestly it is one of the most peaceful places I have stayed. The views are just wonderful.

sehr schöne und modern eingerichtete Zimmer, allerdings recht hellhörig. Der Fahrstuhl war z. B. direkt nebenan und entsprechend laut. Die Matratze könnte weicher sein, ansonsten hat uns das Zimmer jedoch gut gefallen und man hat sich sehr wohl gefühlt.

Beim Frühstück war die Auswahl in Ordnung, für ein Hostel vermutlich auch gut, für unsere Wünsche jedoch leider ein bisschen zu wenig. 

Alles in allem hatten wir einen schönen Aufenthalt und würden für einen Kurztrip wiederkommen.

Great decor and comfortable rooms with excellent little touches as fresh flowers and a cute tea set. Super friendly staff, good (quiet) location while still central. Communal space available but I didnt see this being used a lot while I was there. Loved the pillows!
review.comment_negative: I only missed handsoap in the bathroom, and breakfast was the same every day which became a bit boring on day 5.

review.rating: mới sáng ra té ngay bậc thang khách sạn, 1 chuyến đi thật vô vị
I realise this is a hostel, and not a Hotel…. But I thought taking the king deluxe private room might make a difference
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: The staff were nice
review.comment_negative:
We chose deluxe top of the range rooms, the photos looked good…. But if you like some simple nice things in your hotel room, look further than here. The rooms ‘look’ pretty, but fall short of being nice. No aircon in a room that has a whole wall of glass was awful… the fan was inadequate. 
The bed was big, but only two meagre pillows provided. 
Again, the bathroom looked pretty, but huge basin sitting on a piece of trendy slice from a tree, meant absolutely nowhere to put any toiletries.  No shower screen separating shower and toilet meant toilet was drenched after each shower. No shelf to house the shower gel and shampoo provided, so they sat half balanced on the edge of the basin.
No bath at provided, and the tiles are super slippery.
Breakfast was included, but if you like coffee…I would not recommend …it was DIY style breakfast and just generally, not great…An Cafe, just down the road the place to go for breakfast.

review.comment_positive:
- The room and the hotel overall was well decorated. It was quiet and private, there were sounds coming from other room but I can mostly blocked it by closing the window.
- The staff was really polite and gentle
review.comment_negative:
- The water heater have 2 modes: freezing cold and piping hot. Even if you find a sweet spot to use, it will randomly cold/hot again during the shower (I guess this is because the water heater is shared between rooms)
- The mattress was light, and there is nothing stopping it moving around the bed, so you find yourself moving the mattress during your sleep
- There was an incident during my stay, I spill some iodine to the blanket. While this is my fault, and I resolved it peacefully with the receptionists, I don't like the fact that they told me I may have to compensate (aka pay for the blanket) for the damage as it may not usable by other guests. While that's reasonable, I'd wish they try to wash/send it to laundry shop first before told me that

review.comment_positive: Fantastic hotel. Amazing room, great vibes. Would definitely recommend staying here if you are in Dalat. The included breakfast was a nice addition.

review.rating: Perfect location with an okay room

review.comment_negative: The bed always felt humid. The towels were pilling and useless. They barely dried you and afterwards were soaking wet and never dried again. At least, we got a new towel the next morning. It was an open shower which would've been fine if the water actually dried after a night. There was no ventilation but a small window. I love all the wooden statues and furnishings throughout the hotel that give it a homely and comfortable vibe. Good, quiet location, and a short walk to the night market.
review.comment_negative: No air conditioning.

review.comment_positive: Очень красивый отель с интересными дизайнерскими решениями. Внизу прекрасная рабочая зона и кофейня, персонал просто лапочки. Видно что все новое. И расположен рядом с центром, но на вполне тихой улочке.
review.comment_negative: В номере не было холодильника и немного неудобная мебель для сидения, скорее декоративного плана. Плюс завтрак заканчивается в 9, а значит мы ни разу на него не попали, ну камон ребята, люди в отпуске не хотят вставать в 7-8 утра. Хотя честно сказать и спать было сложность из-за очень плохой звукоизоляции, с утра мимо ездили туристические автобусы, которые сигналили так будто находились у меня в комнате, слышимость ужасная. И цукаты которые оставляют в номере в качестве угощения были по ощущениям не очень свежие - пора бы сменить)

review.comment_positive:
I really enjoyed my stay at Pi Hostel.
It was really clean, they came everyday to clean the dorm and the bathroom. The breakfast is included and really good with many delicious options (local and western food) - you should try the sticky rice if you never did!!
You can rent bike there, and its possible to book a bus from the hostel (shuttle bus until the bus station).
Really zen and relaxing atmosphere. There are also a piano in the hall.

review.comment_positive:
Wir waren mit unserem Aufenthalt im Pi Boutique Hostel sehr zufrieden 🙂👍🏻. 

Es wirkt sehr neu und modern. 
- Die Zimmer sind schön eingerichtet, sauber und hell
- Das Personal ist freundlich und hilft beim buchen von Touren oder der Weiterreise
- die öffentlichen Räume sind sehr schön eingerichtet mit vielen Pflanzen, haben uns direkt wohl gefühlt. 
- Mit den Jalousien konnte man das Zimmer Nachts dunkel machen (Straßenlaternen waren ziemlich hell)
- das Frühstück ist lecker und vollkommen ausreichend
- gute Lage um die Stadt zu erkunden

Damit kann man echt nicht viel falsch machen.
review.comment_negative:
Jammern auf hohem Niveau:
- kein Kühlschrank im Zimmer
- Morgens hat manchmal der Abfluss im Bad gemüffelt. Das hat sich aber wieder verzogen nach kurzer Zeit

review.comment_positive: Ein sehr schönes Hostel mit einer top Lage, von wo man aus zu Fuß schnell im Zentrum von Da Lat ist und eine super Aussicht auf die Stadt hat. Die Zimmer sind sehr gepflegt und sauber, sodass wir uns sofort wohl gefühlt haben. Der Service war auch erstklassig. Early Checkin war selbst ohne Voranmeldung kein Problem und auf Nachfrage habe ich auch einen Haartrockner bekommen. 😊 Wir würden hier jederzeit wieder bleiben!

review.comment_positive: Das Ambiente ist sehr schön gestaltet und liegt zentral, so dass man vieles auch zu Fuß erreichen kann.
review.comment_negative:
Das Frühstück war im Vergleich zu anderen Hostels in Vietnam unterirdisch und geschmacklos. Die Rezeption wird von Studenten geführt, die wenig enthusiastisch sowie wenig freundlich sind und für die das Wort "Service" leider ein Fremdwort ist. Das Hostel bewirbt sich auch als Café, allerdings scheint nur eine Person die Maschine bedienen zu können, die meist nie da war. Zumindest wenn ich gefragt habe. Die Badezimmertür ist milchig und der Spiegel hat eine elektronische Uhr inne mit einem blau leuchtenden Powerbutton, welches Abends leider durch die Badezimmertür in das ganze Schlafzimmer gescheint hat. Somit war es nie wirklich dunkel und für sensible Schläfer sind die Chancen auf einen erholsamen Schlaf gleich 0. Es ist zudem auch etwas hellhörig. Leider war das Futtonbett sehr unbequem und die Bettwäsche klebte. 

Für eine Nacht, wenn man sonst nichts Passableres findet, ist es okay.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: La chica de recepción muy amable, no puedo decir lo mismo de los dueños.
review.comment_negative:
El precio es demasiado caro para lo que ofrece. La terraza no tiene mesa ni sillas y sus vistan son a un precioso edificio en construcción. A partir de las 7am los obreros empiezan su jornada laboral y ya no se puede descansar.
El desayuno es escaso y malo, café americano, zumo de bote, mermelada, crema de cacahuete y algo de bollería, eso es todo lo que hay.
La ducha no tiene mampara ni separación del resto del servicio por lo cuando te duchas se inunda entero.
Pagas como si fuera un hotel de tres estrellas, las fotos dan el pego, pero sigue siendo un hostel y además, malo.

review.comment_positive: Interieur geweldig. Echt schoon.

review.room_type: Phòng có giường cỡ King nhìn ra cảnh núi non
Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
review.comment_positive:
Super clean and comfortable hostel. I haven’t stayed in a hostel in years and had to book a dorm room as Da Lat was BUSY for Tet Holidays. I was so happy I stayed here, the room was clean, well designed and thoughtfully laid out. Lockers for safe keeping of luggage and the bathrooms were clean. Location was also great as I felt close enough to the centre of the city while not being too close to be affected by the noise at night!

Staff were ace too, in particular Nhien who was so helpful. She helped me book a bike tour of the countryside (I highly recommend this with Easy Riders) and also my bus ticket to leave! All through my stay Nhien was on hand to help with questions, recommendations and advice. Super friendly and incredibly smart young person! Thank you for everything 🙏🏾

Common areas were incredibly stylish and comfortable too. Everything was thoughtfully decorated and looked particularly pretty for Tet!
review.comment_negative: Nothing! Will definitely be staying here again when I return to beautiful Da Lat!

review.comment_positive: Das Zimmer ist super modern und praktisch eingerichtet, alles ist sauber! Man hat Fenster zum Lüften! Zu Fuß ist man gleich mal im Zentrum. Das Hostel hat einen eigenen Mopedverleih, was wir sehr praktisch fanden. Buchung von Bus für die Weiterreise wurde gleich erledigt. Bekamen auch Super Tipps für vegetarisches Essen! Das Personal war wirklich super freundlich und man fühlt sich sehr wohl.
review.comment_negative: Die Betten sind wirklich sehr unbequem, einfach steinhart! Wenn man duscht, schwimmt das ganze Bad, aber das ist halt so :)
